entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 3:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: WSW 62 km/h gust 84 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
